name: Home Inspectors California
description: Home Inspectors California is dedicated to setting the standard in affordability, professionalism, and efficiency in the home inspection business. They understand that every real estate transaction is different, each property is unique. Their goal is to give you the best price for your property inspection.

name: Caremed Transport
description: Care MED Transport is a privately owned and operated company providing Non-emergency transportation to the community of Greater Los Angeles and Orange County. Care MED Transport was founded in 2016 based on experience that many people needed a service for transportation to go for doctor's appointment, medical treatments and other medical necessity.

name: Nicola's Kitchen (proof of concept)
description: Established in 1990, Nicola's Kitchen has been serving the San Fernando Valley for many years. In that time we have developed a style of Italian food with influences ranging from the California Coast to the shores of Thailand. We hope that you and your family have had the pleasure of experiencing our unique homemade food as well as our prompt and friendly service.
